form.official-title: To include a question to ascertain United States citizenship and immigration status in each questionnaire used for a decennial census of population, and for other purposes.

section.header: Ascertaining citizenship and immigration status in decennial census of population
section.text: Section 141 of title 13, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (g) as subsection (h); and
by inserting after subsection (f) the following:

subsection.text: Notwithstanding section 5 of this title, the Secretary shall include in each questionnaire used for the conduct of a decennial census of population under subsection (a) a question to ascertain United States citizenship and immigration status.
